Services

Class ClearService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.ClearService

  • public class ClearService
extends java.lang.Object
    Here we clean out the database

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClearService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void ClearAuth()
      ClearAuth erases all of the Auth Tokens in the database by calling the AuthTokenDao
      private void ClearEvents()
      ClearEvents erases all of the events in the database by calling the EventDao
      private void ClearPersons()
      ClearPersons erases all of the people in the database by calling the PersonDao
      void ClearUsers()
      ClearUsers erases all of the users in the database by calling the UserDao
      boolean StartClear()
      begins the process of clearing
